scripts.run:client: tsc -p tsconfig.json && cd node_build && node -r tsconfig-paths/register src
scripts.run:sharder: tsc -p tsconfig.json && cd node_build && node -r tsconfig-paths/register src --ShardManager
scripts.run:debug: tsc -p tsconfig.json && cd node_build && node -r tsconfig-paths/register src --dbg
